name: Fish clicker
description:
A scary game about clicking fishes. Then there's upgrades that you can buy. Last, there's stats. Yeah it's pretty fun, so go play it RIGHT NOW! OR ELSE!!!

When you click on the fish you get a random amount of gold, as well as a random chance that you or the fish will attack. Don't let your hitpoints go to 0!

You can buy 1 HP for 10 gold. Great deal!

You can buy an autoclicker for 200 gold. Will give you 1 gold/sec/clicker risk-free!

You can buy defenders for 300 gold. They decrease damage that the fish deals to you. Buy enough and fish damage will be converted to health added.

You can buy attackers for 400 gold. They increase the damage dealt to the fish.

In fact I could probably just embed the entire game within its description...
